abstract: Former Olympian, Canadian Clara Hughes, reveals in her memoir Open Heart, Open Mind that she tested positive for banned substance in 1994 and that violation was intentionally kept quite.
lead_paragraph: Clara Hughes, a former cyclist and speedskater from Canada, says in a memoir the test in 1994 was intentionally kept quiet.

headline.main: Olympian Writes of Positive Doping Test

snippet: Clara Hughes, a former cyclist and speedskater from Canada, says in a memoir the test in 1994 was intentionally kept quiet.
